original_text:
Michael Jackson King of Pop
Una stella leggendaria
Re del pop e eterno Peter Pan sono solo due dei soprannomi che hanno reso celebre una delle figure più importanti dell’intero panorama musicale. All’inizio è stato la stella incontrastata dei Jackson Five, gruppo formato con i suoi fratelli, e solo in seguito intraprenderà la carriera solista. Da lì in avanti sarà un successo dopo l’altro. Il secondo album, Thriller, verrà riconosciuto come uno dei dischi più influenti della musica pop, restando in classifica per ben 37 settimane e vendendo milioni di copie. A rendere Jackson un artista immortale non è solo il canto, ma anche i balli che accompagnano le sue performance, come il moonwalk, imitato in tutto il mondo.
Per omaggiare nel migliore dei modi un personaggio così importante, la Bally ha creato una slot che attinge a piene mani nell’universo di Michael, con la griglia di gioco attraversata da luci colorate da discoteca in pieno stile anni Ottanta e una colonna sonora che spazia tra Dirty Diana, Beat It e Smooth Criminal.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco ha cinque rulli e tre righe e 25 linee di pagamento fisse. La puntata minima è fissata a 0,40 €, ma può essere innalzata a piacimento.
Con la modalità Autoplay si può selezionare un numero di Spin tra 10 e 200, compresi alcuni limiti di vincita e di perdita oltre i quali il gioco si fermerà, tornando alla modalità manuale.
Per vincere è necessario associare simboli identici da sinistra verso destra (eccetto per gli Scatter) su una linea di pagamento attiva. Nel caso in cui si ottengano più combinazioni vincenti verrà pagata soltanto la più alta.
La volatilità è media, il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) si attesta su un buon 96.01%.
Il Moonwalk Bonus e altre feature
I simboli che valgono di più in Michael Jackson King of Pop riportano tutti al mondo dell’artista statunitense. A valere meno sono le classiche carte da gioco buone per una scala reale, seguite dai piedi sollevati sulle punte, gli occhiali, il cappello e il guanto argentato.
Ci sono poi diversi tipi di Wild con differenti funzioni, come i Moonwalk Wild o i Wild impilati.
La scritta Bonus è il nostro Scatter: tre di questi faranno apparire una ruota divisa in spicchi; facendola girare, si possono vincere Free Spins, gettoni o moltiplicatori.
Abbiamo due tipologie di Free Spin:
– Beat it Free Games: si ottengono dieci giri gratuiti e Wild bloccati durante l’intera funzione.
– Smooth Criminal Free Games: qui otteniamo cinque giri gratuiti durante i quali i vari rulli si trasformano in Wild. Nel primo giro il quinto rullo diventa Jolly, nel secondo si aggiungerà anche il quarto e via via tutti gli altri.

Domande Frequenti 
Posso provare il gioco prima di scommettere soldi veri?

Certamente, sul nostro sito è disponibile la versione demo



Qual è la volatilità della slot?

Michael Jackson King of Pop ha una volatilità media, abbiamo quindi una discreta frequenza di vincite e premi di tutto rispetto.



Dove posso giocare a Michael Jackson King of Pop?

Sui maggiori casinò italiani provvisti di certificazione AAMS.

raw_translation.response:
Michael Jackson King of Pop
A legendary star, the King of Pop and eternal Peter Pan, are just two of the nicknames that have made one of the most important figures in the entire music scene famous. At first, he was the undisputed star of the Jackson Five, a group formed with his brothers, and only later he began his solo career. From there on, it was a success after another. The second album, Thriller, was recognized as one of the most influential pop music records, staying in the charts for 37 weeks and selling millions of copies. What made Jackson an immortal artist was not only his singing, but also the dances that accompany his performances, such as the moonwalk, imitated all over the world.

To pay homage in the best possible way to such an important personality, Bally has created a slot machine that draws heavily from Michael's universe, with the game grid crossed by disco-colorful lights in full 80s style and a soundtrack that ranges from Dirty Diana to Beat It and Smooth Criminal.

Slot Features
The game grid has five reels and three rows and 25 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is set at €0.40, but can be raised at will.

With the Autoplay mode, you can select a number of spins between 10 and 200, including some win and loss limits beyond which the game will stop, returning to manual mode.

To win, you must match identical symbols from left to right (except for Scatters) on an active payline. In case of multiple winning combinations, only the highest one will be paid.

The volatility is medium, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is a good 96.01%.

Moonwalk Bonus and other features
The symbols worth the most in Michael Jackson King of Pop all refer to the world of the American artist. The classic playing cards that are good for a royal flush are worth less, followed by raised feet on tiptoe, glasses, hat, and silver glove.

There are also different types of Wilds with different functions, such as Moonwalk Wild or stacked Wilds.

The Bonus lettering is our Scatter: three of these will bring up a wheel divided into segments, spinning it, you can win Free Spins, coins or multipliers.

We have two types of Free Spins:

- Beat it Free Games: you get ten free spins and blocked Wilds during the entire function.
- Smooth Criminal Free Games: here we get five free spins during which the various reels turn into Wilds. In the first spin, the fifth reel becomes a wild card; in the second, the fourth reel will also be added, and so on, until all the others.

Frequently Asked Questions
Can I try the game before betting real money?

Certainly, the demo version is available on our website.

What is the volatility of the slot?

Michael Jackson King of Pop has a medium volatility, meaning we have a decent frequency of wins and respectable prizes.

Where can I play Michael Jackson King of Pop?

On the major Italian casinos provided with AAMS certification.

Below is a review for the slot game "Michael Jackson King of Pop".

Game features and bonuses

Review: Michael Jackson King of Pop
A legendary star, the King of Pop and eternal Peter Pan, are just two of the nicknames that have made one of the most important figures in the entire music scene famous. At first, he was the undisputed star of the Jackson Five, a group formed with his brothers, and only later he began his solo career. From there on, it was a success after another. The second album, Thriller, was recognized as one of the most influential pop music records, staying in the charts for 37 weeks and selling millions of copies. What made Jackson an immortal artist was not only his singing, but also the dances that accompany his performances, such as the moonwalk, imitated all over the world.

To pay homage in the best possible way to such an important personality, Bally has created a slot machine that draws heavily from Michael's universe, with the game grid crossed by disco-colorful lights in full 80s style and a soundtrack that ranges from Dirty Diana to Beat It and Smooth Criminal.

Slot Features
The game grid has five reels and three rows and 25 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is set at €0.40, but can be raised at will.

With the Autoplay mode, you can select a number of spins between 10 and 200, including some win and loss limits beyond which the game will stop, returning to manual mode.

To win, you must match identical symbols from left to right (except for Scatters) on an active payline. In case of multiple winning combinations, only the highest one will be paid.

The volatility is medium, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is a good 96.01%.

Moonwalk Bonus and other features
The symbols worth the most in Michael Jackson King of Pop all refer to the world of the American artist. The classic playing cards that are good for a royal flush are worth less, followed by raised feet on tiptoe, glasses, hat, and silver glove.

There are also different types of Wilds with different functions, such as Moonwalk Wild or stacked Wilds.

The Bonus lettering is our Scatter: three of these will bring up a wheel divided into segments, spinning it, you can win Free Spins, coins or multipliers.

We have two types of Free Spins:

- Beat it Free Games: you get ten free spins and blocked Wilds during the entire function.
- Smooth Criminal Free Games: here we get five free spins during which the various reels turn into Wilds. In the first spin, the fifth reel becomes a wild card; in the second, the fourth reel will also be added, and so on, until all the others.

Michael Jackson King of Pop has a medium volatility, meaning we have a decent frequency of wins and respectable prizes.

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Michael Jackson King of Pop is a slot game with five reels and three rows. The game has 25 fixed paylines and a minimum bet of €0.40, but players can raise it at will. It has an Autoplay mode that allows players to select the number of spins between 10 and 200, including win and loss limits. The game's volatility is medium, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.01%. To win, players must match identical symbols from left to right on an active payline. In case of multiple winning combinations, only the highest one is paid. There are different types of Wild symbols, such as Moonwalk Wild and stacked Wilds, and Scatters that trigger bonus rounds.

Graphics and Design

The game grid of Michael Jackson King of Pop is crossed by disco-colorful lights with an 80s-inspired design, paying homage to Michael Jackson's universe. The symbols refer to the world of the King of Pop and include playing cards, raised feet on tiptoe, glasses, hat, and silver glove. The game's graphics are visually appealing and pay attention to the details, making the gameplay experience immersive.

Soundtrack

The soundtrack of Michael Jackson King of Pop ranges from Dirty Diana to Beat It and Smooth Criminal, including other popular songs by the legendary artist. The game's audio pays tribute to the King of Pop's discography and adds to the immersive gaming experience. It features high-quality sound effects when players spin the reels or trigger winning combinations.

Jackpot and Payouts

The payouts in Michael Jackson King of Pop depend on the value of the matched symbols and the player's bet. There are different types of Wilds and Scatters that trigger bonus rounds, which can increase the player's chances of hitting winning combinations. The game has a medium volatility, meaning that players can expect a decent frequency of wins and respectable prizes. The game does not have a progressive jackpot, but the maximum win is 2,500x the player's stake.

Wagering Options

Michael Jackson King of Pop has a minimum bet of €0.40 and allows players to raise it at will. The game's Autoplay feature enables players to choose the number of spins and includes win and loss limits beyond which the game will stop automatically. The game's medium volatility and respectable payouts make it accessible to all types of players, from beginners to high-rollers. The game is available on major Italian casinos provided with AAMS certification, and it offers a demo version for players to try it before betting real money.

Review: Michael Jackson King of Pop
A legendary star, the King of Pop and eternal Peter Pan, are just two of the nicknames that have made one of the most important figures in the entire music scene famous. At first, he was the undisputed star of the Jackson Five, a group formed with his brothers, and only later he began his solo career. From there on, it was a success after another. The second album, Thriller, was recognized as one of the most influential pop music records, staying in the charts for 37 weeks and selling millions of copies. What made Jackson an immortal artist was not only his singing, but also the dances that accompany his performances, such as the moonwalk, imitated all over the world.

To pay homage in the best possible way to such an important personality, Bally has created a slot machine that draws heavily from Michael's universe, with the game grid crossed by disco-colorful lights in full 80s style and a soundtrack that ranges from Dirty Diana to Beat It and Smooth Criminal.

Slot Features
The game grid has five reels and three rows and 25 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is set at €0.40, but can be raised at will.

With the Autoplay mode, you can select a number of spins between 10 and 200, including some win and loss limits beyond which the game will stop, returning to manual mode.

To win, you must match identical symbols from left to right (except for Scatters) on an active payline. In case of multiple winning combinations, only the highest one will be paid.

The volatility is medium, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is a good 96.01%.

Moonwalk Bonus and other features
The symbols worth the most in Michael Jackson King of Pop all refer to the world of the American artist. The classic playing cards that are good for a royal flush are worth less, followed by raised feet on tiptoe, glasses, hat, and silver glove.

There are also different types of Wilds with different functions, such as Moonwalk Wild or stacked Wilds.

The Bonus lettering is our Scatter: three of these will bring up a wheel divided into segments, spinning it, you can win Free Spins, coins or multipliers.

We have two types of Free Spins:

- Beat it Free Games: you get ten free spins and blocked Wilds during the entire function.
- Smooth Criminal Free Games: here we get five free spins during which the various reels turn into Wilds. In the first spin, the fifth reel becomes a wild card; in the second, the fourth reel will also be added, and so on, until all the others.

Frequently Asked Questions
Can I try the game before betting real money?

Certainly, the demo version is available on our website.

What is the volatility of the slot?

Michael Jackson King of Pop has a medium volatility, meaning we have a decent frequency of wins and respectable prizes.

Where can I play Michael Jackson King of Pop?

On the major Italian casinos provided with AAMS certification.
